item.description:
What: The Grease Sing-A-Long
Where: AMC Loews Boston Common 19
When: 7:00 pm showtime (let's head in line at 6:30 pm)

Opens July 8, 2010 | Runtime:1 hr. 50 min.

From the Fandango site:
http://www.fandango.c...

"Rydell High's most famous graduating class is going back to school. A newly restored print brings the highest-grossing musical of all time, GREASE (1978), to the big screen as a sing-along. Join Danny and Sandy with your own crew of T-Birds and Pink Ladies for a carnival ride back to those amazing summer nights!"

... Lyrics will be subtitled kareoke style, with the text very, very, very animated. The Trailer has to be seen to be believed: http://www.youtube.co... ... I gotta see this!

Purchase Tickets: http://www.fandango.c... ... you might want to purchase tickets in advance for this first night. Feel free to dress up! The guy's costume is easy for this one: Jeans and a black T-Shirt.

Where to Meet:

T.J. Maher will be at the CityPlace Food Court starting at 5:30 pm in front of the D'Angelos. Feel free to drop by! CityPlace is at 8 Park Plaza, in The Massachusetts State Transportation Building. We can commendeer tables, pushing them together as more people arrive. We can leave the food court at 6:30 pm to walk over to the theater and get in line.

T.J. Maher is 5 foot 7 with blue eyes, short brown hair, a "Hello My Name is T.J." nametag, a red MEETUP sign attached to his black messenger bag, jeans, a black T-Shirt, and is debating whether or not to wear his black leather motorcycle jacket he wore all throughout college. No, he never had a bike. He just loved all the pockets to put stuff in.

More about the event:
http://www.prnewswire...

"GREASE: SING-A-LONG will begin playing on Thursday, July 8th in exclusive showings in 12 markets across the country. Tickets for these first cities are quickly selling out, including New York, NY (AMC Village); Los Angeles, CA (AMC Century City); Chicago, IL (AMC River East); San Francisco, CA (AMC Metreon); Boston, MA (AMC Boston Commons); Dallas, TX (AMC Northpark); Atlanta, GA (Regal Atlantic Station); Seattle, WA (AMC Pacific Place); Ft. Lauderdale/Miami, FL (Sunrise Gateway); San Diego, CA (AMC Fashion Valley); Austin, TX (Alamo Lamar); and Ocala, FL (Regal Hollywood)".

... Heh. Paramount is trying to start a big buzz on Twitter it seems, telling people to "demand" it on Eventful.com http://www.Eventful.c...
item.name: Grease Sing-A-Long @ AMC Loews Boston Common 19
